id.title: Id
id.description: The human-friendly ID of the File

source_id.title: Source Id
source_id.description: The unique identifier of the source associated with the document.

file_type.title: File Type
file_type.description: The type of the file (MIME type).

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_creation_date.title: File Creation Date
file_creation_date.description: The creation date of the file.

file_last_modified_date.title: File Last Modified Date
file_last_modified_date.description: The last modified date of the file.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The creation date of the file.

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: The update date of the file.

is_deleted.title: Is Deleted
is_deleted.description: Whether this file is deleted or not.
